entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning. Wind chill near minus 44. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
